solution_line_template: She drew {drawings_saturday} on Saturday and {drawings_sunday} on Sunday for a total of {drawings_saturday}+{drawings_sunday} = <<{drawings_saturday}+{drawings_sunday}={total_drawings}>>{total_drawings} drawings

She charges ${charge_per_drawing} per drawing and she drew {total_drawings} caricatures so she made ${charge_per_drawing}*{total_drawings} = $<<{charge_per_drawing}*{total_drawings}={total_money_made}>>{total_money_made}
